record.name: New Application Hosting
record.description: Request hosting of a new Business Application.
record.detailedDescription:
Request hosting of a new Business Application. The request may include consulting services for determining hardware, software, database, and network requirements. After initial analysis, separate hardware and software procurement request may be necessary and are requested separately.

To get started, please describe your application requirements below.
record.options: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Hardware Specification and Capacity Planning</label><label id="opt2">(1) Hardware Installation and Configuration</label><label id="opt3">(1) Software Installation</label><label id="opt4">(1) Network Capacity and Planning</label><label id="opt5">(1) Network Installation and Configuration</label></form>
record.optionsAlias: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Hardware Specification and Capacity Planning</label><label id="opt2">(1) Hardware Installation and Configuration</label><label id="opt3">(1) Software Installation</label><label id="opt4">(1) Network Capacity and Planning</label><label id="opt5">(1) Network Installation and Configuration</label></form>
